name: Sken Zabriss

trait.name: Powerful Build
text: Sken counts as one size larger when determining her carrying capacity and the weight she can push, drag, or lift.

trait.name: Special Equipment
text: Sken wears a ring of obscuring. With it, she can cast the fog cloud spell centered on herself three times per day. The cloud lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.

reaction.name: Stone's Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
text: When Sken takes damage, she can use her reaction to reduce the damage taken by 8 (1d12 + 2).

description: Source: Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 221
